verses.name: Judges 5:13
verses.text: Then he made him that remaineth have dominion over the nobles among the people: the Lord made me have dominion over the mighty.

verses.name: Judges 5:14
verses.text: Out of Ephraim was there a root of them against Amalek; after thee, Benjamin, among thy people; out of Machir came down governors, and out of Zebulun they that handle the pen of the writer.

verses.name: Judges 5:15
verses.text: And the princes of Issachar were with Deborah; even Issachar, and also Barak: he was sent on foot into the valley. For the divisions of Reuben there were great thoughts of heart.
